pnTable.name: Master Type of Time Interval Table

reference.title: Product Name Standard Document
reference.organization: Fleet Numerical Meteorology and Oceanography Center

reference.title: GRIB 2
reference.infoUsed: GRIB2 Type of Time Interval, table 4.11

entry.name: successive times processed have same forecast time, start time of forecast is incremented
successive times processed have same start time of forecast, forecast time is incremented
successive time processed have start time of forecast incremented and forecast time decremented so that valid time remains constant
successive times processed have start time of forecast decremented and forecast time incremented so that valid time remains constant
floating subinterval of time between forecast time and end of overall time interval
